gameDetails.name: Axis & Allies: Europe
gameDetails.description: One of the first releases from Avalon Hill games under Hasbro. A&A: Europe uses the same system as the original Axis & Allies, although now the focus of the game in on the European theater of WWII. Two new units have been added to the game (destroyers and artillery) and there are some modifications to the rules and overall strategic scenario.
